maniac noun [C]
(MENTALLY ILL)
a person who behaves in an uncontrolled way, not worrying about risks or danger: Some maniac was running down the street waving a massive metal bar.informal I won't get in the car with Richard - he drives like a maniac! Idiom
like a maniac

(PERSON WITH MENTAL ILLNESS)
a person who seems unable to control his or her behavior and may commit violent acts: a homicidal maniac
